enter-key-behavior.name: Enter key behavior
enter-key-behavior.hint: When prompted to confirm sending a message, what should happen if you press the Enter key?

other.name: Confirm other messages
other.hint: Confirm sending messages that don't fit into any of the below categories.

emote.name: Confirm emotes
emote.hint: Confirm sending messages with the /emote command or any of its aliases.

whisper.name: Confirm whispers
whisper.hint: Confirm sending private messages with the /w command.

roll.name: Confirm rolls
roll.hint: Confirm sending rolls with the /r command.
